item.title: PFE
item.description: score:152 Chances: Pfizer’s gene therapy for the treatment of a rare inherited bleeding disorder has been approved in Canada and is pending approval in the U.S., indicating potential positive developments in the company’s product pipeline. Pfizer’s acquisition of Seagen Inc. for $43 billion and its full-year 2024 revenue guidance suggest potential growth opportunities for the company in the coming years.
